name: Creature Street
description:
A normally quiet town of animals is rocked by the murder of its venerable mayor.

You play a detective tasked by the mayor's loyal assistant to bring the killer to justice.

WASD - Move around

E - Interact with objects

SPACE - Advance text

J - Check Crime Journal

Interview suspects, collect evidence, and weigh your options carefully!

Art, Writing, and Music by Albert Peter

Coding and other essential support by Chris Taylor
